title: With Economy Reeling From Ukraine War, Egypt Secures $3 Billion I.M.F. Loan
description: The local currency had tumbled against the dollar, and food and energy prices soared in the wake of Russia’s February invasion of Ukraine, adding to the struggles of millions of Egyptians.
dc:creator: Vivian Yee
media:description: A bustling street market in the center Cairo on Monday.
